snippet.title: Justice League: Amber Heard Confirms Role as Aquaman’s Queen
snippet.description:
http://screenrant.com/
https://www.facebook.com/ScreenRant
https://twitter.com/screenrant

Hi this is Ryan with Screen Rant’s featured news of the day.

Aquaman officially has his queen.

You may have HEARD the rumors back in January about who the role of Aquaman’s wife Mera, was being given to - and we now have confirmation that the casting rumors we HEARD are true.. YA HEARD? Ok if you haven’t figured it out yet, the role has been given to Amber Heard. Amber Heard.

The actress made the confirmation herself during an interview with Entertainment Tonight-- while promoting her film The Adderall Diaries--

And even gave a little tease of what her costume will be like.

So half-armor and half-scales huh--- we had an artist put together a rendition of what that will look like…

And oh Wow, that looks awful.

The character of Mera has the same strength and endurance as Aquaman, but instead of dealing with sea life, she deals with water itself and is able to bend it to her will..

But seriously, it’s a hardcore power. If she wanted to, she could evaporate all the water out of a human body. Imagine that. You’d be so thirsty.

What do you think of the casting? Let us know in the comment section.

Thanks for watching and make sure to keep it on Screen Rant for more news.
